name: df-uni
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wceq(cuni(c0), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))))
comment: Define the union of a class i.e. the collection of all members of the members of the class. Definition 5.5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 16. For example, ` U. { { 1 , 3 } , { 1 , 8 } } = { 1 , 3 , 8 } ` ( ~ ex-uni ). This is similar to the union of two classes ~ df-un . (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-1993.)
